name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Site Walkthrough | Sitespedia - Create Step-by-Step Tutorial for Any Site

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture and manage important walkthroughs and store them. You can also embed or share these walkthroughs anywhere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Walkthrough Extension is an online video documentation tool that allows users to record and document the steps taken during a task or process as a video. This is an effective tool that can be used to create video tutorials, screencasts, and other types of instructional videos with ease by capturing each step visually in real-time. This powerful tool is perfect for businesses of all sizes who need to create detailed documentation. This extension makes recording steps a breeze. Simply click the capture button, and the extension will automatically capture the entire screen.

What can you do with the Walkthrough Chrome Extension:

1. Once you have installed the Walkthrough Chrome extension, you can start capturing the required steps on the required web page by just clicking on the "Start Capture" button. Walkthrough will capture your screen with the clicks you make.

2. You can Restart, Delete, Pause, and Resume the steps that you have captured at any time.

3. With Walkthrough, you have the advantage of switching between various tabs to capture steps on other pages altogether.

4. You get the URL of the web page that you are capturing as step 1, which makes it much easier to understand the steps.

5. Walkthrough offers the option of editing all the captured steps after being redirected to the editing page once completed capturing.

6. On the editing page, you can preview all the changes that you want to make to your captured steps. On the player by clicking on the "View It" button, you can manually view all the captured steps. By clicking on the "Try It" button, you can see the automated steps that you have captured. By clicking on the "Watch It" button, you can see all the steps that you have created and edit them. By clicking on the "New Out" button, you can see all the steps like a walkthrough.
